abstract.t: A method for mutual network endpoint assessment is introduced in thisdocument. In current NEA requirements, only the assessment performedby network owner is described. However, for some applications likeonline business and file sharing, the unilateral assessment is notenough to ensure the two communication parties are both secureEspecially in P2P application, the endpoints perform equalresponsibility and hence the mutual network endpoint assessment seemsmore necessary. each endpoint may configure its security assessmentpolicy based on its own security concerns. .
